scene.subject: Jasper-Prime enters frame left to center; plants fist on hip. Barrel-chested, espresso-brown matte fur with silver-back sheen.
scene.setting: Forest clearing at golden hour; tall New England pines; dappled sunbeams on mossy floor.

lighting: Backlit rim; warm highlights; soft shadow under brow ridge
notes: Maintain naturalistic look; minimal bloom; keep exposure for rim light
